extension.summary: [COLOR blue]Oldskool Dj Sets, Mixtapes and Ravepacks From Different Websites In One Place![/COLOR] Lets Get XBMC Raving To The Sound Of The Oldskool!
extension.description: Oldskool Dj Sets, Mixtapes and Ravepacks[CR]from different websites in one place.[CR]Acid House, Hardcore, Jungle, Drum n Bass, House n Garage, Grime and much more from 1988 to present day[CR]for your raving needs..°--°..[CR][CR]This [COLOR blue]Audio Addon[/COLOR] is brought to you by[CR][COLOR blue]TheYid009 and Ctrl_Esc[/COLOR][CR][CR][COLOR gold][B]For more info please read the changelog.txt[/B][/COLOR][CR]
extension.disclaimer: Die von diesem Addon dargestellten Inhalte werden weder von dem Ersteller dieses Addons gehostet, noch steht der Ersteller dieses Addons in irgendeiner Beziehung zu den Content-Anbietern.
